@CoediogCowboi @EnvAgency @NEYorksNLincs The mitigation is based on digging up 10% of the meadow and moving it down the road. @NEYorksNLincs think this is fantastic. They also share an office with the EA.

@CoediogCowboi @EnvAgency @NEYorksNLincs In brief they're knocking down a floodbank and rebuilding it bigger, which will take out part of the SSSI at Clifton Ings & Rawcliffe Meadows. The scheme achieves a marginal uplift in flood protection, which could be delivered in other ways.

The Trust believes the action is a contravention of the Wildlife and Countryside Act and The Environmental Permitting Regulations 2016 and should have required consent from the @EnvAgency as well as planning consent, at the very least. https://t.co/UA7QxUCla4 @EmmaHowardBoyd
@whiterosegreen @EnvAgency @NEYorksNLincs Whatt? Can you link?

text: @AnabaticW @JuliaBradbury @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil And the answer, since you clearly care about local residents, is to campaign for more funds to be made available through the required levels of taxation. My sympathy is limit by the failure of rural Herefordshire to vote to raise the taxes required.

@AnabaticW @DanielMacKenzi6 @JuliaBradbury @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Itâ€™s all very well villagers and parish councils sanctioning action, but thatâ€™s how witches got burnt in the Middle Ages. @GeoffDa84684078 @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil That's a very good, positive suggestion. But I'd add that the farmer must understand the gravity of their offence and must make amends, through the normal legal processes, as do all who commit serious offences.

RT @DaveThroupEA: Weâ€™ve used our powers of entry at the River Lugg #Herefordshire incident

14 specialist officers from @EnvAgency @Naturalâ€¦

@AnabaticW @JuliaBradbury @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Well, sure - if you want to split hairs. The point is that, while I have sympathy for your M-i-L's situation the fact she's paid taxes doesn't make her special. The region where she lives votes, consistently, to lower taxes - which is why the EA lacks funds.
